Question: Much of modern architecture, including the early work of Mies van der Rohe, can be traced back to this person's innovative work.
Hints: This person had risen to head draftsman and handled all residential design work in the office.
Gordon House, completed in 1963, was this person's last Usonian design.
With Corwin gone, this person moved out of the Schiller Building and into the nearby and newly completed Steinway Hall Building.
